name: UIPreviewTarget
desc: An object that specifies the container view to use for animations.

items.name: init(container: UIView, center: CGPoint, transform: CGAffineTransform)
items.desc: Creates a preview target object using the specified container view and configuration details.

items.name: init(container: UIView, center: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a preview target object using the specified container view and center point.

items.name: var container: UIView
items.desc: The container for the view being animated.

items.name: var center: CGPoint
items.desc: The point in the containing view at which to place the center of the view being animated.

items.name: var transform: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: An affine transform to apply to the view being animated.
